title: Fun Reading
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Sorry for making you tag along with me today<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It’s okay, I like books too, so I’ll accompany you anytime you want to go to a bookstore<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I’m glad that I get to buy the novel that Setsuna-chan recommended~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Setsuna recommended that book?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah. The friendship between the heroine and her partner is really really lovely, or so she said, so it really piqued my interest….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>That…. Sounds like something I would like to read too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Then, would you go to a cafe and read with me? I want to hear your thoughts on it, Umi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Is it alright!? If so, I shall take you up on that offer!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Okay then…. After that, there may be one more bookstore that I want to go to….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>? We can go right now though?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>No, then I wouldn’t know Umi-chan’s reaction to…. Ah<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eh? My reaction to?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s fine, it’s nothing. Forget about it! For now, let’s just go to a cafe!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
